net.sf.jailer.util

Class Quoting

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.sf.jailer.util.Quoting

  • public class Quoting
extends java.lang.Object
    Quotes and un-quotes SQL identifier in a DBMS specific way.
    Author:
    Ralf Wisser
